result.reason: The issue only states a broad integration request without requirements, schema details, or acceptance criteria needed to scope implementation.
result.approach: Ask for concrete use cases, supported Guacamole DB/version details, integration mode (import/export/live sync), and security/auth constraints before designing the feature.
